titleHead: Enter name - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK

subtitle.withAppointee: Enter the name of the person you are authorised to appeal for.

withoutAppointee.invalid: You have entered an invalid title. Enter your title.

withAppointee.invalid: You have entered an invalid title. Enter their title.

withoutAppointee.invalid: You have entered an invalid first name. Enter your first name in full.

withAppointee.invalid: You have entered an invalid first name. Enter their first name in full.

withoutAppointee.invalid: You have entered an invalid last name. Enter your last name in full.

withAppointee.invalid: You have entered an invalid last name. Enter their last name in full.
